long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Tabby is an extension that can be summed into two parts. The gallery and the tile view. The gallery acts like a normal photo viewer making it easy to view many photos from a site in their full glory. It also has more functionality with the panning and zooming features.

The tile view lays all the images/videos out in a convenient UI that lets you not only find images that you want but allow you to save images in bulk!

There are many more features planned for version 2 and 3.
